sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react' const inputTag = { padding: '10px 20px', borderRadius: '5px', border: '1px solid grey'} const pDisplay = { paddingLeft: '10px', paddingRight: '10px', fontSize: '30px', display: 'inline'} class Purchase extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { fullName: '', address: '', city_town: '', staProReg: '', zip: '', country: '', cardHolderName: '', cardNum: 0, cardType: '', cvv: 0, month: 0, year: 0 } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) } handleChange(event) { const {type, name, checked, value} = event.target type === 'checkbox' ? this.setState({[name]: checked}) : this.setState({[name] : value}) } handleSubmit(event) { console.log('submit') event.preventDefault() } render() { return ( <>

We're Prepping To Ship Your Order! Just One Final Step!

Billing Address

Name On Package:

Use Card Holder Name

Address

City/Town

State/Province/Region

Zip

Country

Credit Card Info

Card Holder Name

Card Number

Card Type

CVV

Expires

/

{/* redirect to products page */}
) } } //make sure that the radio button replaces the input of the 'Name On Package' when checked and clears when unchecked //make 'onsubmit' functions //store info when submitted in database //record all inputted data and store them accordingly within each database section //call the databases required to do so //use state variables to store data export default Purchase
